    • Method Detail

      • encryptWithProof

        public ListExpression encryptWithProof(ListExpression ballot,
                              java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> raceGroups,
                              PublicKey pubKey)
        Takes an unencrypted ballot and encrypts it, while also generating a set of NIZKs to prove it is well formed.
        Parameters:
        ballot - - Unencrypted ballot of the form ((race-id counter) ...) counter = {0, 1} with possible write-in field appended
        raceGroups - - a list of of groups of race-ids that are considered "together" in a well formed ballot.
        pubKey - - the Adder PublicKey to use to encrypt the ballot and generate the NIZKs
        Returns:
        a ListExpression in the form (((vote [vote]) (vote-ids ([id1], [id2], ...)) (proof [proof]) (public-key [key])) ...)

      • encryptSublistWithProof

        private ListExpression encryptSublistWithProof(ListExpression ballot,
                                     PublicKey pubKey,
                                     byte[] writeInKey)
        Take an unencrypted ballot and make it encrypted, while also generating a NIZK.
        Parameters:
        ballot - This is the pre-encrypt ballot in the form ((race-id counter) ...)
        pubKey - this is an Adder-style public key
        Returns:
        An ListExpression of the form ((vote [vote]) (vote-ids ([id1], [id2], ...)) (proof [proof]) (public-key [key]))

      • encryptWriteIns

        private java.util.List<ASExpression> encryptWriteIns(java.util.List<java.lang.String> writeIns,
                                           byte[] key)
        A method which encrypts write ins using the AES scheme
        Parameters:
        writeIns - the written-in values for candidate names
        key - the key to use for AES encryption, will be encrypted and sent with encrypted ballot
        Returns:
        result a List of ASExpressions representing the encrypted bytes of each write-in

      • encrypt

        public ListExpression encrypt(ListExpression ballot,
                     Key publicKey)
        Take an unencrypted ballot form and make it encrypted.
        Parameters:
        ballot - This is the pre-encrypt ballot in the form ((race-id counter)...)
        publicKey - this is the public ElGamal key used to encrypt the ballot
        Returns:
        This method returns the encrypted form of ballot in the form ((race-id E(counter))...)

        Returns:

      • decrypt

        public ListExpression decrypt(ListExpression ballot,
                     ListExpression rVals,
                     Key publicKey)
        Decrypt a ballot using the r-values (not the decryption key).
        Parameters:
        ballot - This is the ballot, formatted ((race-id encrypted-counter)...)
        rVals - These are the r-values, formatted ((race-id r-value)...)
        publicKey - The necissary ElGamal public key.
        Returns:
        This method returns the decrypted ballot, formatted ((race-id plaintext-counter)...)

      • getRecentRandom

        public ListExpression getRecentRandom()
        Get the most recent random list.
        Returns:
        This method returns the random list in the form ((uid rvalue)...)

      • getRecentAdderRandom

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<AdderInteger>> getRecentAdderRandom()
        Get the most recent random, for the Adder encryption sub-system.
        Returns:
        This method returns the random list used in the last call to encryptWithProof(...).

      • getRecentEncryptedBallot

        Get the result of the most recent encrypt call.

        This method returns the most recent encryption.
